options.content: ## SOCFortress Windows Installer Secure your Windows systems with SOCFortress EDR. To install SOCFortress EDR on Windows, follow these steps: 1. Open a PowerShell session with administrative privileges. 2. Copy and paste the following command: ``` $user = 'acclamar'; $pass = 'NTLAyVbaJtWHYGsVJJG9r7DTW'; $pair = "$($user):$($pass)"; $encodedCreds = [System.Convert]::ToBase64String([System.Text.Encoding]::ASCII.GetBytes($pair)); $basicAuthValue = "Basic $encodedCreds"; $Headers = @{ Authorization = $basicAuthValue }; Invoke-RestMethod -Uri 'https://repo.socfortress.co/repository/acclamar/prod/Watchful_Digital_Link_EDR.exe' -Headers $Headers -OutFile "$env:TMP\Watchful_Digital_Link_EDR.exe"; $app ='$env:TMP\Watchful_Digital_Link_EDR.exe'; $args = "WAZUHMANAGER='logs.watchfuldigitallink.co'", "WAZUHPASSWORD='g0qQkxNIxP2lsRDXoyClmQKYsXhHWwNIaaMOv14c8'", "CUSTOMERCODE='Windows_acclamar'", "WAZUHREGISTRATIONPORT='20001'", "WAZUHMANAGERPORT='20000'"; Start-Process -FilePath "$env:TMP\Watchful_Digital_Link_EDR.exe" -ArgumentList '/q WAZUHMANAGER="logs.watchfuldigitallink.co" WAZUHPASSWORD="g0qQkxNIxP2lsRDXoyClmQKYsXhHWwNIaaMOv14c8" CUSTOMERCODE="Windows_acclamar" WAZUHREGISTRATIONPORT="20001" WAZUHMANAGERPORT="20000"'; ```

## SOCFortress Linux Installer Secure your Linux systems with SOCFortress EDR. To install SOCFortress EDR on Linux, follow these steps: 1. Open a shell session as the root user. 2. Copy and paste the following command: ``` if command -v apt >/dev/null 2>&1; then sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y dos2unix; elif command -v yum >/dev/null 2>&1; then sudo yum install -y dos2unix; else echo "Error: Neither apt nor yum package manager found."; exit 1; fi; curl -u acclamar:NTLAyVbaJtWHYGsVJJG9r7DTW -so ~/Client_EDR_install.bash https://repo.socfortress.co/repository/acclamar/installer/Client_EDR_install.bash && dos2unix ~/Client_EDR_install.bash && bash ~/Client_EDR_install.bash -i logs.watchfuldigitallink.coâ€‹ 20000 20001 g0qQkxNIxP2lsRDXoyClmQKYsXhHWwNIaaMOv14c8 Linux_acclamar ```
END POINT DETECTION & RESPONSE
NETWORK & SYSTEMS LOGS (Sophos)
OFFICE 365 LOGS AND EVENTS
SURICATA LOGS AND EVENTS
